column.name: SM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '

                  声  明  书

' +'

内核小组成员与本次参与表决的项目是否存在以下需要回避表决的情形：(请选择“是”或“否”)

' +'

1、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目的项目组成员（包括该项目其他中介机构项目组成员）；

' +'

2、本人或直系亲属直接或间接持有待表决项目相关公司的股份等权益；

' +'

3、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目相关公司的董事、监事、高级管理人员，或为待表决项目相关公司的实际控制人；

' +'

4、本人与待表决项目的项目组，归属于公司同一投行业务部门（团队），或待表决项目的项目组属于本人分管的承做部门（团队）；

' +'

上述条款中直系亲属包括配偶、子女和父母。

' +'

 

'

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: TX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“尽职调查阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成立项审批流程后，才能发起内核流程<font>'

column.name: BZHSCCK
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> // var url='/bss/ibb/page/index.sdo#/map/knowledge/map/mapDocs/flid=54&bt=立项资料'; var url='/bss/ibb/page/index.sdo#/map/knowledge/map/mapDocs/flid%3D81%26bt%3D%25E5%2586%2585%25E6%25A0%25B8%25E9%2598%25B6%25E6%25AE%25B5%25E7%259B%25B8%25E5%2585%25B3%25E5%2588%25B6%25E5%25BA%25A6%25E5%258F%258A%25E6%2596%2587%25E6%259C%25AC%25E6%25A8%25A1%25E6%259D%25BF'; '' //'下载'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_NHSP_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_NHSP_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

constraint.SQL: ["FUNC_IB_LCFQCSJY('lcIB_NHSP',tIB_XMXX.ID,tIB_XMXX.XMLX,{1}) = 1 and \r\nEXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXSP T WHERE T.HYJG = 0 AND T.XMMC = tIB_XMXX.ID)\r\n or ID = {0}",[{"expression":"XMMC.ID","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1},{"expression":"ID","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: DGXTJZDCJDSCBL
column.describe: 底稿系统尽职调查阶段上传比例

column.name: ZYLDYJ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcib_nhsp";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

column.name: SBWJZSFCZWPLSJ
column.describe: 申报文件中是否存在未披露数据

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: TS2
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color = red >请先检查项目负责人、项目组成员、签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)、协办人是否正确，再修改项目组人员信息<font />'

column.name: CKLXLC
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select MAX(instid) from ecif.lcIB_LXSP t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_LXSP&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '立项审批流程'

column.name: LXSHYJ_FXXM
column.describe: 立项审核意见(风险项目)

column.name: LXZKBSHY
column.describe: 立项质控部审核员(主审)

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.ID in (select userid from lbmember where orgid IN (13832,13833,13834,13835,13836) and roleid=7) and tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.name: LXZKBSHY_FS
column.describe: 立项质控部审核员(副审)

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.ID in (select userid from lbmember where orgid IN (13832,13833,13834,13835,13836) and roleid=7) and tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.name: NHZKBSHY_ZS
column.describe: 内核质控部审核员(主审)

constraint.SQL: ["tuser.orgid in (select id from jgcrm.LBORGANIZATION start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: NHZKBSHY_FS
column.describe: 内核质控部审核员(副审)

constraint.SQL: ["tuser.orgid in (select id from jgcrm.LBORGANIZATION start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_NHSP_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_NHSP_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.name: XMDGYJXX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT('底稿移交时间:' || DGYJSJ || ' | ' || '底稿存放地点及具体位置:' || CFDD || ' | ' || '底稿数量:' || DGSL || ' | ' || '底稿编号:' || DGBH || '|')) FROM ecif.lcIB_NHSP_NHCL WHERE LCIB_NHSP_ID = ?",[ID])

column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> "<font style='color:red;font-weight:bold'>以下所有附件请上传签字版。</font>"

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
